title: Certificates & Achievements

list-certificates.name: Google Developer Certifications Mobile Web Specialist
list-certificates.description: Shows the ability to build fast, responsive, and accessible mobile web applications using modern web standards and best practices.

list-certificates.name: Node.js Certified from HackerRank
list-certificates.description: Validates practical skills in Node.js, including backend logic, APIs, and asynchronous JavaScript development.

list-certificates.name: PHP Certification from SoloLearn
list-certificates.description: Covers core PHP concepts used to build dynamic and server-side web applications.

list-certificates.name: React & Redux Certification from SoloLearn
list-certificates.description: Demonstrates understanding of React components, state management, and building scalable user interfaces.

list-certificates.name: Problem Solving Certification
list-certificates.description: Highlights strong problem-solving skills using algorithms, logic, and structured thinking.

list-certificates.name: Training Awareness ISO/IEC 27001
list-certificates.description: Provides awareness of information security principles and ISO/IEC 27001 standards for protecting data.

list-certificates.name: SQL Certification from SoloLearn
list-certificates.description: Covers database querying using SQL, including data filtering, joins, and basic data management.

list-certificates.name: JavaScript Certification from SoloLearn
list-certificates.description: Demonstrates knowledge of JavaScript fundamentals for building interactive web applications.

list-certificates.name: Code for Marketing Certification (SEO)
list-certificates.description: Introduces technical SEO basics and how code structure impacts search engine visibility.

list-certificates.name: Responsive Web Design Certification
list-certificates.description: Shows the ability to create responsive layouts that work across mobile, tablet, and desktop devices.

list-certificates.name: CSS Certification from SoloLearn
list-certificates.description: Covers styling, layout techniques, and visual design using modern CSS features.

list-certificates.name: HTML Certification from SoloLearn
list-certificates.description: Demonstrates understanding of HTML structure, semantic markup, and web content best practices.

continue-learning-description: Certifications represent milestones in my learning journey, not thefinal destination. I continuously explore new technologies, improve existing skills, and apply knowledge through real-world projects and hands-on experience.
focus-description: My focus is on building scalable, maintainable solutions while staying adaptable to evolving industry standards and best practices.
